responsibilities: Contributed to the development of a custom hardware signal testing system for Makino F-series machines.
Integrated Fanuc Machine Tool Controllers (MTCs) testing using FOCAS2 to automate PMC I/O verification.
Implemented Modbus RTU communication to control and monitor TD39 digital I/O modules.
Extended a PySide2-based GUI for real-time signal inspection, result logging, and test automation.
Performed troubleshooting, signal mapping, and validation for CNC machine control logic.
Programmed a robot to represent Malaysia in ABU ROBOCON 2025.
Developed control software to navigate a game field, interact with game objects, and execute mission-critical tasks under tight timing constraints.
Tested and optimized motor control systems for improved robot response.
Integrated distance sensors (Lasers, encoders, and LiDAR) for real-time localization and obstacle awareness. Thus improving the robot's position accuracy by 50%.
